document.full_text: a young crop of europeans may be battling it out atop of the world rankings, but 40-year-old american phil mickelson has a shot to spoil the party and grab the number one spot that has long eluded him.
document.title: mickelson, surrounded by european rivals, eyes top spot
lines_and_colors: a young crop of europeans may be battling it out atop of the world rankings, but 40-year-old american phil mickelson has a shot to spoil the party and grab the number one spot that has long eluded him.
